nodes.text: The Model 00 heating system was a type of heating system produced by the Min-Dal Company and available as an armor enhancement. Using insulation and heating elements the Model 00 allowed its wearer to survive in temperatures far below what were normally tolerable. The system sold for  1000 during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire following the Battle of Yavin.

The Model 00 heating system was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013. The same information was also included in the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released the following year by Fantasy Flight Games.
